mapper.sql: a.ID as id, a.ACCOUNT_ID as accountId, a.STATUS as status, a.OCC_MEMBER_NUMBER as occMemberNumber, a.REGULATOR as regulator, a.REGULATOR_INFO as regulatorInfo, a.REGISTER_NUMBER as registerNumber, a.REGISTER_POSITION as registerPosition, a.CREATED_BY as createdBy, a.CREATED_DATE as createdDate, a.UPDATED_BY as updatedBy, a.UPDATED_DATE as updatedDate
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ACCOUNT_PAR_BROKER_INFO( ID , ACCOUNT_ID , STATUS , OCC_MEMBER_NUMBER , REGULATOR , REGULATOR_INFO , REGISTER_NUMBER , REGISTER_POSITION , CREATED_BY , CREATED_DATE , UPDATED_BY , UPDATED_DATE ) VALUES ( #{id} , #{accountId} , #{status} , #{occMemberNumber} , #{regulator} , #{regulatorInfo} , #{registerNumber} , #{registerPosition} , #{createdBy} , #{createdDate} , #{updatedBy} , #{updatedDate} )

INSERT INTO ACCOUNT_PAR_BROKER_INFO
ID ,
ACCOUNT_ID ,

mapper.update:
UPDATE ACCOUNT_PAR_BROKER_INFO
ACCOUNT_ID = #{accountId} ,
STATUS = #{status} ,
OCC_MEMBER_NUMBER = #{occMemberNumber} ,
REGULATOR = #{regulator} ,
REGULATOR_INFO = #{regulatorInfo} ,
REGISTER_NUMBER = #{registerNumber} ,
REGISTER_POSITION = #{registerPosition} ,
CREATED_BY = #{createdBy} ,
CREATED_DATE = #{createdDate} ,
UPDATED_BY = #{updatedBy} ,
UPDATED_DATE = #{updatedDate}
WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO ACCOUNT_PAR_BROKER_INFO( ID , ACCOUNT_ID , STATUS , OCC_MEMBER_NUMBER , REGULATOR , REGULATOR_INFO , REGISTER_NUMBER , REGISTER_POSITION , CREATED_BY , CREATED_DATE , UPDATED_BY , UPDATED_DATE )
SELECT #{item.id} , #{item.accountId} , #{item.status} , #{item.occMemberNumber} , #{item.regulator} , #{item.regulatorInfo} , #{item.registerNumber} , #{item.registerPosition} , #{item.createdBy} , #{item.createdDate} , #{item.updatedBy} , #{item.updatedDate} FROM DUAL

update.foreach: UPDATE ACCOUNT_PAR_BROKER_INFO SET ACCOUNT_ID = #{item.accountId} , STATUS = #{item.status} , OCC_MEMBER_NUMBER = #{item.occMemberNumber} , REGULATOR = #{item.regulator} , REGULATOR_INFO = #{item.regulatorInfo} , REGISTER_NUMBER = #{item.registerNumber} , REGISTER_POSITION = #{item.registerPosition} , CREATED_BY = #{item.createdBy} , CREATED_DATE = #{item.createdDate} , UPDATED_BY = #{item.updatedBy} , UPDATED_DATE = #{item.updatedDate} WHERE ID = #{item.id}

mapper.update: UPDATE ACCOUNT_PAR_BROKER_INFO SET ACCOUNT_ID = #{accountId} , STATUS = #{status} , OCC_MEMBER_NUMBER = #{occMemberNumber} , REGULATOR = #{regulator} , REGULATOR_INFO = #{regulatorInfo} , REGISTER_NUMBER = #{registerNumber} , REGISTER_POSITION = #{registerPosition} , CREATED_BY = #{createdBy} , CREATED_DATE = #{createdDate} , UPDATED_BY = #{updatedBy} , UPDATED_DATE = #{updatedDate} WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT FROM ACCOUNT_PAR_BROKER_INFO a WHERE a.ID = #{id}
